summaries.name: Neckbreaker
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @feat:bonebreaker AND @feat:greater_grapple AND @feat:improved_grapple AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @feat:jawbreaker AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:heal >= 12

summaries.name: Djinni Spin
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:djinni_style OR @feat:djinni_spirit OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)

summaries.name: Monkey Shine
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @feat:monkey_moves AND @feat:monkey_style AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:acrobatics >= 11 AND @skill:climb >= 11

summaries.name: Shaitan Skin
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 15 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @feat:shaitan_style OR @bab >= 11 OR @class:monk >= 9)

summaries.name: Whirlwind Attack
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @dex_score >= 13 AND @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:combat_expertise AND @feat:dodge AND @feat:mobility AND @feat:spring_attack AND @bab >= 4

summaries.name: Moonlight Stalker Master
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@int_score >= 13 OR @feat:blind_fight OR @feat:combat_expertise OR @feat:improved_feint OR @feat:moonlight_stalker OR @feat:moonlight_stalker_feint OR @skill:bluff >= 9 OR @spell:darkvision OR @rage_power:low_light_vision)

summaries.name: Giant Killer
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @feat:cleave AND @feat:goblin_cleaver AND @feat:orc_hewer AND @feat:power_attack AND @feat:strike_back AND @bab >= 11 AND @race:dwarf

summaries.name: Kirin Strike
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:kirin_style AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:knowledge_arcana >= 9 AND (@skill:knowledge#dungeoneering >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#local >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#planes >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#religion >= 3)

summaries.name: Earth Child Topple
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND @feat:earth_child_style AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:acrobatics >= 6

summaries.name: Sunlight Summons
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)

summaries.name: Final Embrace Master
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 17 AND @int_score >= 3 AND (@race:naga OR @race:serpentfolk OR @ability:constrict) AND @feat:ability_focus#constrict AND @feat:final_embrace AND @feat:final_embrace_horror AND @bab >= 9

summaries.name: Shaitan Earthblast
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @feat:shaitan_skin OR @feat:shaitan_style OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)

summaries.name: Tripping Twirl
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:combat_expertise AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:tripping_staff AND @feat:weapon_focus#@quarterstaff AND @feat:weapon_specialization#@quarterstaff AND @bab >= 12

summaries.name: Umbral Scion
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @cha_score >= 13 AND @wis_score >= 13 AND @feat:drow_nobility AND @feat:greater_drow_nobility AND @feat:improved_drow_nobility AND "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Moonlight Stalker Feint
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@int_score >= 13 OR @feat:blind_fight OR @feat:combat_expertise OR @feat:moonlight_stalker OR @skill:bluff >= 6 OR @spell:darkvision OR @ability:low_light_vision)

summaries.name: Kirin Path
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:kirin_strike AND @feat:kirin_style AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:knowledge_arcana >= 12 AND (@skill:knowledge#dungeoneering >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#local >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#planes >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge#religion >= 5)

summaries.name: Earth Child Binder
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND @feat:earth_child_style AND @feat:earth_child_topple AND @feat:greater_trip AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:acrobatics >= 9

summaries.name: Deathless Master
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 15 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:deathless_initiate AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @feat:ironhide AND @bab >= 9

summaries.name: Efreeti Stance
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 15 OR @feat:efreeti_style OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 11 OR @class:monk >= 9)

summaries.name: Spider Summoner
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@ability:summon_monster#unchained_summoner OR (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)) AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Twin Thunders Master
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND ((@feat:improved_two_weapon_fighting AND @feat:two_weapon_fighting) OR @ability:flurry_of_blows#unchained_monk) AND @feat:twin_thunders AND @feat:twin_thunders_flurry AND @feat:weapon_focus#selected_weapon AND @bab >= 9

summaries.name: Marid Coldsnap
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:marid_spirit OR @feat:marid_style OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)

summaries.name: Splintering Weapon
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @bab >= 1 AND @proficiency:selected_weapon AND "Weapon made of primitive material"

summaries.name: Fire Music
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @skill:spellcraft >= 5 AND @bility:bard_spellcaster AND "an arcane fire spell from some other spellcasting"

summaries.name: Deathless Zealot
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 17 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:deathless_initiate AND @feat:deathless_master AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @feat:ironhide AND @bab >= 12

summaries.name: Moonlight Summons
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)

summaries.name: Sympathetic Rage
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@race:half_orc OR @race:orc) AND (@alignment:ng OR @alignment:cg OR @alignment:n OR @alignment:cn OR @alignment:ne OR @alignment:ce)

summaries.name: Improved Umbral Scion
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @cha_score >= 13 AND @wis_score >= 13 AND @feat:drow_nobility AND @feat:greater_drow_nobility AND @feat:improved_drow_nobility AND @feat:umbral_scion AND "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Drow Nobility
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Blood Vengeance
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@race:half_orc OR @race:orc) AND (@alignment:ng OR @alignment:cg OR @alignment:n OR @alignment:cn OR @alignment:ne OR @alignment:ce)

summaries.name: Twin Thunders Flurry
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND ((@feat:improved_two_weapon_fighting AND @feat:two_weapon_fighting) OR @ability:flurry_of_blows#unchained_monk) AND @feat:twin_thunders AND @feat:weapon_focus#selected_weapon AND @bab >= 6

summaries.name: Final Embrace Horror
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 15 AND @int_score >= 3 AND (@race:naga OR @race:serpentfolk OR @ability:constrict) AND @feat:final_embrace AND @bab >= 6

summaries.name: Greater Drow Nobility
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @cha_score >= 13 AND @feat:drow_nobility AND @feat:improved_drow_nobility AND "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Shapeshifter Foil
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@skill:knowledge_arcana >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge_nature >= 5) AND "ability to use any polymorph effect"

summaries.name: Efreeti Touch
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:efreeti_style OR @feat:efreeti_stance OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)

summaries.name: Djinni Spirit
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 15 OR @feat:djinni_style OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 11 OR @class:monk >= 9)

summaries.name: Improved Drow Nobility
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @cha_score >= 13 AND @feat:drow_nobility AND "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow

summaries.name: Deathless Initiate
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 13 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @bab >= 6

summaries.name: Terrorizing Display
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @feat:dazzling_display AND @feat:demoralizing_lash AND @feat:taskmaster AND @feat:weapon_focus AND @skill:intimidate >= 10 AND @race:hobgoblin AND @proficiency:selected_weapon

summaries.name: Marid Spirit
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 15 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:marid_style OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 11 OR @class:monk >= 9)

summaries.name: Starlight Summons
summaries.prerequisiteFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)
